website_summaries.verdict: With a seamless fit that's supportive, comfortable, and flattering, these well-made briefs top our list for everyday  wear.
pros: The fit is attractive under clothes thanks to stretchy nylon material with a seamless construction
Wide band isn't binding, yet it helps control the tummy
cons: Could lose shape if not laundered in the delicate cycle
No cotton lining in the crotch

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t think my pair would have pulled strings like the other customers showed in pictures
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think my pair would have pulled strings like the other customers showed in pictures. After the first wash the fabric pulls were in the same spot. it has to be a manufacturer defect. or a problem with the machine etc.. I was very disappointed. So I went ahead and ordered panties from lane Bryant like I should have done to begin with.. trying to save a buck cost me more in the end.. I am very sensitive about how fabric feels. The fit was good and the texture was good, but the fabric wear and tear was extremely poor.
customer_reviews.author: Gun Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Nice panties.
customer_reviews.text: These have good stretch but don't have a cotton lining in crotch. The leg opening is a bit tighter than i like, i am thin and have no curves, so was surprised how snug they fit. A curvy woman would probably find this uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JillU

customer_reviews.title: The fit is fine but there is no cotton panel inside so a ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit is fine but there is no cotton panel inside so a pantiliner or sanitary pad does not stick.
customer_reviews.author: babs

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, soft, smooth, stretchy, just the right leg and waist
customer_reviews.text: Soft and stretchy, nice breathable material. Very comfortable - not tight control panties, but flattering and nice on the body. Smooth and no lines or bulging. I was worried that the graphic horizontal stripes on the panties would have too much contrast, but it’s really subtle and actually stylish. They run true to size, maybe a bit bigger than I thought. I just purchased more.
customer_reviews.author: Photonsnow

customer_reviews.title: ... had one pair of these and they are the best fitting, most comfortable pair of underwear I ever ...
customer_reviews.text: I had one pair of these and they are the best fitting, most comfortable pair of underwear I ever wore in my life and I am very picky- very happy to find more to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great woman panties!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorites. I found my first pair at Kohl’s. Found many colors on amazon.They wear like I exprect them to. They are pretty and extremely comfortable. They continue to look great after many washes.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: I really like these. They fit exactly as they should
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They fit exactly as they should. They stay right where they are all day too, no riding up or rolling down. You can almost forget you have them on! I'm going to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Patient Lady

customer_reviews.title: Try them, you'll love them
customer_reviews.text: I have never been much on very stretchy under garments, but (no pun intended) these are the most comfortable, stay in place, do not roll, slide or climb, hold the stuff together, with or without pants on underwear I have EVER worn. These are the ONLY underwear I ever want in my drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl A. Yates

customer_reviews.title: I liked these a lot but they are too big.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Large like I always do. These were too big for me and that surprised me. Sometimes large is small on me but, never big. I was sorry because they are really nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi DuBose

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few years ago at Kohls. During the Quarantine I needed underwear - and found them on Amazon - FOR A BETTER PRICE than Kohls! Win Win! I love the higher waist. They wash in the washing machine and I even throw them in the dryer. They are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit as they look like they would based on the model
customer_reviews.text: Odd that every pair received is frayed on the inside of the panties as if they had been previously worn or tried on by someone they were too small for. Does not fit as they look like they would based on the model.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Buchholz

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a medium and it fits more like a small. The stretch is really nice though and I could definitely see a size up being a perfect fit. I'm a size 4 pant and medium-size undies normally work. However.... Not this time.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis M

customer_reviews.title: Not holding up after a few washes
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these. Great fit, but now after a few washes it’s pilling.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lobster

customer_reviews.title: Underwear lines
customer_reviews.text: The underwear is comfortable. I have wider hips and my rear is round in the middle and lower aspec, so despite going a size up I still get underwear lines. Otherwise I would give these underwear a 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pair of underwear. Won’t hold in your muffin top really but still worth purchasing and seem to hold up well in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Hapcity

customer_reviews.title: No cotton gusset. Bad fabric.
customer_reviews.text: Avoid. Shows panty lines under yoga pants, has no cotton gusset. Fabric blend is itchy and too hot and thick.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect -- no issues at all!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and well priced. They did not stretch out or lose their shape throughout the day. They did not roll down, ride up or pinch in anyway. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Coastal customer

customer_reviews.title: Item defect
customer_reviews.text: Beige Item is frayed or shagged inside in 2 places so did not open black package.
customer_reviews.author: Jane B. Haugen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect panties
customer_reviews.text: Not sexy or youthful but soooo comfortable. I bought 10, then another 10, and now another 7. I'm throwing away all my other panties because nothing comes close to these in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: katroy

customer_reviews.title: Soft & seamless perfect
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Love the way they feel. Material is very soft. The best thing I like is they are seamless.
customer_reviews.author: Maria De la Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great fit & comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these ladies no- muffin top undies Perfect all the way around, comfort, the legs don’t ride up. Super comfortable.❤️
customer_reviews.author: Blink

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite panties to wear. Very comfortable and the top doesn’t roll down. The legs don’t cut into you either. This is all I buy now.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Guess

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLY THE BEST UNDIES
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, soft, well made, washes well, doesn't get saggy. pretty colors. Try them, you will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: One instead of three
customer_reviews.text: The first two times I ordered this item, it was $8.05 for a package of 3. This time it was for a single pair. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Brady Kelso

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my mother and she loves how comfortable and seamless they are. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Inge

customer_reviews.title: Nice brief
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the fit, the way the fabric feels on my skin and feel this was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: butterflybeth

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy these in store and they no longer have them. Very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rouba

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performer
customer_reviews.text: These panties won't create a muffin top, they won't give you a wedgie, and they'll keep you feeling dry. They will never make you regret that you wore them, even on long days of travel and walking.
customer_reviews.author: C. Aiello

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and fit true to size. I've been purchasing these for years. Also like the Warners bra which is the same type of fabric and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Simons

customer_reviews.title: Love these panties
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Warner panties for years and I really love this new style.
customer_reviews.author: KarenB

customer_reviews.title: To hi on the waist
customer_reviews.text: The only problem my wife found with this panties is that they are very hi waisted
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Finally...a no line panty that is really as advertised! No binding anywhere. No riding up or down. Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: These underwear just did not work for me. They rolled down and we're uncomfortable on the top of my legs. I wanted to love these but I don't like them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Powell

customer_reviews.title: What you are buying
customer_reviews.text: It appeared from the pictures that there were 3 pairs in a package. Not true. Only one. Be sure you know what you are purchasing
customer_reviews.author: KatyKate

customer_reviews.title: I like design but sizing no
customer_reviews.text: Sizing was all wrong and I bought bigger but still small
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Lynn Egan

customer_reviews.title: My favorite fitting undies.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is true to size. Breathable. Super comfy, and I tend to be a "Princess and the Pea" type.
customer_reviews.author: amsnd

customer_reviews.title: Wont disappoint! Love♡
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for!!!! Love them. They are so comfortable. I had to buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort!
customer_reviews.text: very comfy! fit really well and are not hot in this summer temperatures!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Fit was a tiny bit small but still comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Was nice to be able to get the quantity of underwear that I wanted and in the colors I wanted-not like at the department stores.
customer_reviews.author: Barb M

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they fit just as shown in the picture. They're comfortable and fit just below the waistband of my slacks.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Full Coverage and no ride up
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 pairs and will buy more! So comfy. They are full coverage and no wedgies!
customer_reviews.author: KDL

customer_reviews.title: Poor stretchy fabric
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy with pulled threads on the inside. Bought only one so wont waste time to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Althea M.

customer_reviews.title: No wedgies undies!
customer_reviews.text: So soft and comfy. I am walking, bending, lifting, etc. at work all day and they don't roll at the waist, they fit great, and no wedgies!!
customer_reviews.author: this girl says

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, good fit
customer_reviews.text: These are good everyday panties. They are not so tight you can barely breathe like some shapewear. Yet they have more hold than plain cotton panties. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie E.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Fit is great and very comfortable lingerie by Warners. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Porter

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Ok but like less expensive ones I ordered at the same time better.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bemis

customer_reviews.title: not as described or packed
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as Seamless. Individual wrap also says Seamless but came with seams at waistline.
customer_reviews.author: j. c.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Very little tummy support however. Was expecting a firmer fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Maria R Frattaroli

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They changed the fabric not as nice as they once were.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good fit nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Well made and fit very nicely. More form fitting than the average under pants.
customer_reviews.author: G. Piechowiak

product_meta.title: Warner's No Pinching No Problems Seamless Brief
product_meta.description: Our #1 panty collection is also available in seamless. You can even choose your perfect pair from our wide collection of styles! finding your perfect pair is a cinch because no day should begin (or end) with a pinch.
feature_bullets: These panties have a wide waistband that won't dig in, preventing muffin top for a smooth waistline
Seamless all-over stretch also provides a great fit and superior comfort
